mapper.insert: insert into iot_collection(`client_id`, `ability_id`, `value`, collect_time) values (#{clientId}, #{abilityId}, #{value}, now())

insert into iot_collection(`client_id`, `ability_id`, `value`, collect_time) values
(#{item.clientId}, #{item.abilityId}, #{item.value}, now())
mapper.select: select b.`ability_id`,b.`value`, b.`collect_time` from (select `client_id`,max(`id`) as latest from iot_collection where `client_id` = #{clientId} group by `ability_id`) a left join iot_collection b on a.`latest` = b.`id`
